title: The Fugitive
description: The smoldering and action-packed return to award-winning fantasy author Andrew J. Peters’ Werecat series.Jacks travels to the Barbados with his only clue to what the Glaring’s assassin was after: his maker’s key to a safety deposit box at an offshore bank. While waiting to claim its holdings, he meets an alluring South African ex-pat Maarten who hosts a nonstop pleasure cruise on his yacht.With his nerves scratched raw from living on the run, it’s too tempting of an escape for Jacks to turn away. But while he’s acquiring a taste for Maarten’s hard partying, nihilistic way of life, back in New York City the Glaring closes in on his boyfriend Farzan and his maker’s secret source of power.Also in the Werecat series: The Rearing (Book One), The Glaring (Book Two), and The Sim Ru Prophecy (Book Four).
author: Andrew J. Peters
